column5: FTR FTR could have a strong Prima Facie case of fraud with regards to Short Distort It would be interesting if institutional lenders had any inclinationknowledge of this and still lent out the shares This could imply that they are also part of the fraud It could be a huge case I am not an expert however the evidence looks really strong The amount of fake and manipulated information I have read about FTR this has to be the first serious test case for a reverse pump and dump
